title: Extended and condensed widths in regular and bold?
content:
I'm looking for examples of sans-serif text families that include extended and condensed widths – in additional to a regular – in a regular and a bold weight; ones similar to Univers, such as Vonness.  
Thank you very much for your suggestions!
author: fabi
